articles.title: Eerie Eclipse on the Red Planet: NASA’s Perseverance Spots “Googly Eye” in Mars Sky [Video] - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA’s Perseverance rover captured an intriguing astronomical event from Mars' Jezero Crater: a transit of the Martian moon Phobos across the Sun. This rare event, resembling a "googly eye," revealed not only the celestial dynamics of Mars' moons but also off…
articles.content:
NASA’s Perseverance rover recently captured an unusual “googly eye” effect on Mars, as the Martian moon Phobos passed in front of the Sun, obscuring part of it. Credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech/ASU/MSSS
NAS… [+4885 chars]

articles.content:
Amazon CEO Andy Jassy on Thursday hinted at an improved, “agentic” version of the company’s Alexa assistant one that could take actions on a user’s behalf.
